data.title: Rhode Island on Pause - Week 3
data.text:
Pursuant to the Grant Program Rules, each entity on this list qualified for the Grant Program based on the information, acknowledgements and attestations contained in its Application, and in accordance with the Grant Program Rules. If any of the information contained in an entityâ€™s Application, which was signed under the penalties of perjury, is discovered to be untrue, inaccurate, or incomplete, then the entity may be subject to civil and criminal penalties imposed by law and further is required to return the grant. Please note, this list includes only the grant amount for the third week of the Pause; checks issued for the initial first two weeks of the Pause appear in a separate list. Although the Grant Program deadline has passed, applications submitted prior to the deadline are still being reviewed and this list will be updated as additional qualified entities are approved.

The list contains each Grant Recipient's name, address, and the award amount as of February 23, 2021.
